name: To The Moon (itch) (SolarPellets)
description:
This is the demo for a game without a working title... as of yet.

I wanted to get the movement and basic functionality ironed out, and this suffices perfectly for that purpose. The movement is lightly based on Mischief Makers. This is also my submission for the Movement Jam and for the FFS 2022 Jam.

Controller is only partially supported for now, I can't get the right stick to be picked up properly, and I haven't implemented pause menu controls.

Thanks to Skyler Ray for the sound effects
